author: rgreig
msg: QPID-177 Patch supplied by Rob Godfrey: adapter now calls the correct createTextMessage overloaded method.

author: dlouzan
msg: - Added a META-INF/context.xml for deployment. It sets the crossContext property to true for being able to access other portlet applications
- Deleted the old src/xml dir and its contents
- Set castor debug output to false on castor.properties
- Added all debug output from pluto in log4j.properties
- Added support for filtering server-config.wsdd and log4j.properties in the pom.xml. This way they get customized with the tomcat dir specified on build.properties
- Modified pluto dependency to provided, it's supposed to be available to all portlets on a portal
